i1.name: Runic Blade
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Riven''' gains a ''Charge'' for 6 seconds every time she uses an [[champion ability|ability]], stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on subsequent ability casts. '''Riven's''' [[basic attack]]s consume a ''Charge'' to deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 60 for 6|1;6 to 18|formula=30%+6% at level 6, then+6% every 3 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
The bonus damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers and {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

q1.name: Broken Wings
description: '''Riven''' can activate ''Broken Wings'' three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a {{fd|0.3125}}-second {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}} between casts. If '''Riven''' does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, the ability goes on cooldown.

Each of the three casts has '''Riven''' slash with her sword, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck, {{tip|Basic attack reset|resetting}} her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of ''Broken Wings'' if there are any.

{{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, affecting all enemies around the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects.

{{sbc|Third Cast:}} '''Riven''' mimics the first cast's effects in an expanded radius while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all affected enemies 75 units over {{fd|0.75}} seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Riven can activate Broken Wings three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 0.3125-second static cooldown between casts. If Riven does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, the ability goes on cooldown.
Each of the three casts has Riven slash with her sword, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck, resetting her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of Broken Wings if there are any.
First Cast: Riven dashes up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, affecting all enemies around the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.
Second Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects.
Third Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects in an expanded radius while also knocking back all affected enemies 75 units over 0.75 seconds. This cast can cross terrain.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|15 to 95}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45 to 65}}% AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|15*3 to 95*3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|45*3 to 65*3}}% AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Each cast counts as a single ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.
* If ''Broken Wings'' was cast at a target, '''Riven''' will attempt to [[basic attack]] the target afterwards.

w1.name: Ki Burst
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Riven causes her sword to emit a burst of runic energy around her before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
w1.notes:
* The damage and stun of ''Ki Burst'' will occur immediately at the start of cast.
* '''Riven''' is briefly unable to basic attack after the cast time.

e1.name: Valor
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Riven''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, though not through terrain, while {{tip|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and {{ai|Q|Riven}} may be cast during {{ai|W|Riven}} or {{ai|R|Riven}} cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.''{{bug|1}}
''Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
